jira-link-server-address-description: The Address of your JIRA Server
jira-link-username-description: The username of your user that will peek for the links. This user has to have read rights to all projects on your server.
jira-link-regex-description:
A javascript regular expression to identify potential JIRA issue candidates in text messages.
Defaults to PROJECT-###. E.g. MYPRJ-123 PRJ-80
jira-link-add-attachments-description: Add attachment if issue is attached in addition to linking them
jira-link-filter-regex-description: A javascript regular expression to filter issues, which are already in a link, for example.
